words.prompt: Something _____________ is hidden by looking like its surroundings.
To _____________ is to flow or let flow in small drops.
Something _____________ is very unusual or remarkable.
Something _____________ harms or kills by chemical action.
To _____________ is to leap or spring suddenly in attack.
A _____________ is an animal that lives by hunting other animals for food.
An animal that is hunted by another animal is its _____________.
_____________ are rapid motions back and forth or up and down.
To be _____________ means to feel bothered or irritated.
An _____________ is a way of thinking, acting, or feeling.
A _____________ is a noisy disturbance.
A _____________ person is grouchy or in a bad mood.
Something _____________ is well known because it has been heard or seen before.
To be _____________ is to feel disappointed by being kept from doing something.
_____________ people care only about themselves.
A _____________ is something that someone does particularly well or gives extra attention to.
_____________ is the ability to do something in a new way.
If something is _____________, it is easily broken.
_____________ things describe or tell about something.
_____________ means extended to full length.
“The stars are diamonds” is a _____________ because it compares two unlike things.
“My hands are as cold as ice” is a _____________ because it compares two things using like or as.
Snail and tale are words that _____________.
_____________ is the pattern of syllables in a line of poetry.
